title: .NET Developer

title: MSc’s dissertation
description:
- Engineered an innovative web tool that provides internet connection fault tolerance by utilizing next page prediction.

- Implemented the solution using a JavaScript Service Worker to prefetch and cache pages, enabling users to continue browsing seamlessly even during lost or unstable connections.

- Developed a dedicated web benchmarking page to rigorously evaluate the performance and accuracy of the prediction tool.

- Documented the project findings and methodology in Latex, adhering to academic standards.

title: Internship
